The 2019 Novel Coronavirus COVID-19 (2019-nCoV) US Outbreak Dataset

Source: R/data.R
covid_us_states.Rd

daily summary of the Coronavirus (COVID-19) confirmed cases in the United States by state

covid_us_states

Format

A data.frame object

Source

The COVID-19 Tracking Project website

Details

The dataset contains the daily summary of the Coronavirus confirmed cases in the US by state

Examples


data(covid_us_states)

library(dplyr)

# Get summary by sub region of totalcases

covid_us_states
#> # A tibble: 701 x 9
